description: One of the largest white cockatoos, the Moluccan (or Salmon-Crested) has beautiful pale pink feathers that are particularly visible when they raise their large, impressive crest.
temperament: Known for being extremely affectionate, cuddly, and sensitive. They form incredibly strong bonds with their owners and can be very demanding of attention. A true 'velcro bird'.
loudness: Extremely Loud. Perhaps the loudest of all cockatoos, their scream is unbelievably powerful and can be physically painful at close range.
vocalization: Can learn to talk, but they are not the clearest speakers. They are much more known for their incredibly loud screams.
dietaryNeeds: A formulated diet (pellets) is the best base. Supplement with vegetables, some fruits, and nuts. Prone to obesity.
healthPointers: Can live 60-80+ years. Highly prone to feather plucking, self-mutilation, and other stress-related behaviors if they do not receive constant attention. Produce a lot of feather dust.
housing: Absolutely not for apartments. They require a huge, incredibly strong cage or aviary with a secure lock. Minimum 48"W x 36"D x 72"H.
